overview: A story a father reads to his daughter. The story is about Princess Chimi (the sexiest princess) being kidnapped by Togley (the ugly toad monster) and Prince Benjaf (the handsome prince) saving the princess. It is a story that tells a love story like a fairy tale. A close-knit father, mother, and their daughter return to reality as Togley, the fairy tale toad, defeats Prince Benjaf and ends up marrying Princess Chimi. Now, in the real ending, the three families go to bed while having a noisy night today.
title: Papastory
